feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [EU/CA/SNC][Veeam] - Veeam Managed Solution maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 8, 06:00 UTC  -  Apr 12, 16:00 UTC

Mar 19, 22:17 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Veeam offer.

Start time : 08/04/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 12/04/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Backup and restore will be unavailable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for Veeam Managed Solution.


Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [SBG][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Storage
entry.content:
Mar 24, 07:01 UTC
Resolved - Start time: 24/03/2024 04:04 UTC
End time: 24/03/2024 06:56 UTC
User impact : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root Cause : It xas due to a malfunction on a power supply.

Mar 24, 06:20 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Mar 24, 05:15 UTC
Identified - Following all the necessary information.

Start time: 24/03/2024 04:04 UTC
User impact : Some hosts on the server342 are currently unreachable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : sbg1a
Root Cause : Hardware issue
Ongoing Actions: Our technical teams are working to solve this issue.

Thank you for your understanding

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Prive Cloud] - R821L16 -R821L17 - R821L18
entry.content:
Mar 5, 04:17 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 04/03/2024 23:55 UTC
End Time : 05/03/2024 01:40 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX8
Root cause : Disjunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Mar 5, 02:59 UTC
Update - The hosts and datastores in the following racks R821L16, R821L17 and R821L18 have been affected by this incident. We will provide further details as soon as possible.

Mar 5, 01:41 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Mar 5, 00:27 UTC
Identified - Start Time : 04/03/2024 23:55 UTC
User impact : Loss of potential access to admin vm, so vsphere user interface access and sdk are impacted.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX8
Root cause : Disjunction
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on a fix.
